messages.message: ^^ re: flow run problem - after the quick debugging with David, it is this view that is broken. If you open the Flow app to run the metaflow it’ll be fine.
@Ted any pointer to fix this view?
Sounds like it’s related to the status checking callback
My guess is whatever line of code determines that the flow has been run isn’t checking an (alternative?) status reporting format of metaflow
If that’s the case, we might also want to make sure flow and metaflow return status objects of the same shape

Got it… I can help look into it some time after this week. I think previously this view would always show that the flow is still running, but the flow actually finished (if you just refresh the output folder). Today the flow never finishes running in this view.
Awesome, thanks! Sorry it gave you a scare! Metaflow and Flow have had some differences in API mechanics historically, so that would be the first thing I’d check
